data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Gulbarga to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gulbarga, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Gulbarga, Karnataka, India that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, make the 28,229 believers in Gulbarga to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,538,071 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Gulbarga, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Vakkaliga people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help the 28,229 believers in Gulbarga to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 28,229 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.section_summary:
the county of Gulbarga, Karnataka, India has a population of 2,566,300.

We estimate Gulbarga has 28,229 people who might know Jesus, 31,138 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,506,933 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 28,229 believers in the county of Gulbarga the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
